text: William Edward Felix Hodgman (born 20 April 1969) is an Australian politician. He was the 45th Premier of Tasmania from 31 March 2014 to 20 January 2020. He was a member for the Division of Franklin in the Tasmanian House of Assembly from 2002 to 2020. In March 2018, he became the longest-serving leader in the history of the Tasmanian Liberals. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Premiers of Tasmania Category:Liberal Party of Australia politicians Category:Politicians from Hobart Category:University of Tasmania alumni
title: Will Hodgman
